rules.name: api-server-udp-1194
rules.use: For tunneled secure communication between the nodes and the control plane. This is not required for private clusters.

rules.name: api-server-tcp-9000
rules.use: For tunneled secure communication between the nodes and the control plane. This is not required for private clusters.

rules.name: ntp
rules.use: Required for Network Time Protocol (NTP) time synchronization on Linux nodes.

rules.name: custom-dns
rules.use: If you're using custom DNS servers, you must ensure they're accessible by the cluster nodes.

rules.name: api-server-https-443
rules.use: Required if running pods/deployments that access the API server, those pods/deployments would use the API IP. This is not required for private clusters.
